name: Scary Clown Gangster Attack
description:
City clowns have taken over the crime city in this action game. Take your job to create havoc as a disaster clown! Strike terror into city residents’ hearts while performing clown pranks and destroying cars. Wear your colorful mask and terrifying costumes to scare city residents. It’s a horror action game. steal from people, killer pranks, create disaster, strike terror acts, vandalize buildings, destroy everything that comes in your way! Scare everyone with your colorful mask, dangerous costumes, and killer pranks to enter into the clown mafia world with a bang.

Game Features:

- Highly advanced weapons with multiple costumes
- Scary clown games animations
- Awesome 3D graphics in killer clown fighting
- Realistic clown animations
- Highly addictive & challenging gameplay
- Addictive super power game
- Realistic visual effects
- HD graphics clown attack simulator
